text:
The RasterizerTask in crontrib/rasterizertask/sources/org/apache/tools/
ant/taskdefs/optional/RasterizerTask.java calls an undefined method in line 
400.

Solution (properly):

Change:

converter.setPixelToMillimeter(25.4f/this.dpi);

to

converter.setPixelUnitToMillimeter(25.4f/this.dpi);
creator: js@nw3.dk
